channel.title: Godwars Minigame (not like rs, just used their name)
channel.description:
Well its not nearly as good as Delta's castlewars, but its a minigame that I made today and i think it is pretty good, just wanted to see what you guys think about it.
Here's the basics of the game: 1. Players split up into two teams, sara vs zammy (hence godwars). 2. The game is kinda like a team based version of fight pits, the two teams face off until one team is left standing. 3. During the game, you get a "killcount" which defines how many points you will receive if your team wins, so therefore you have to actually do something to help your team win, or you won't get as many points. 4. After the game is completed, the losing team goes home and the winning team rejoices with some newfound points, which they can spend on various god-based rewards (god armor, god robes, godswords etc.).
Here are some pictures of the game, which may or may not be in chronological order:
Me at the waiting room: [IMG]http://i134.photobucket.com/albums/q114/woot_019/godwarswelcome.jpg[/img]
You can't enter the game with capes or hoods/hats on! [IMG]http://i134.photobucket.com/albums/q114/woot_019/nohats.jpg[/img]
Joining the zammy team, notice it gives you a cape and hood, similar to castlewars: [IMG]http://i134.photobucket.com/albums/q114/woot_019/zammyteam.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i134.photobucket.com/albums/q114/woot_019/gamestarting.jpg[/img]
You will be unable to remove your cape and hood, nor be able to equip any other capes or hoods/hats during the game: [IMG]http://i134.photobucket.com/albums/q114/woot_019/nocapes.jpg[/img]
After the 5 min are up, the game begins! Good luck. [IMG]http://i134.photobucket.com/albums/q114/woot_019/gamebegun.jpg[/img]
Anyway, i just wanted to see what the rest of the community thinks about this minigame, and maybe some features i can add. Also if ur just gonna post something like "omg n33b l2code coz ur minigame sux0r" then just try to refrain... thanks :D

item.title: Godwars Minigame (not like rs, just used their name)
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

well this only took a few hours to make, depends on how much java you know (i almost know the basics ftw)

[quote=“ownageownt, post:13, topic:184237”]xx nub xx that is nice =]]. I’m starting to work on a champion scroll mini-game.

  1. You get invited to the arena randomly. You kill a dark beast for a scroll that teleports you to the arena when clicked.
  2. You fight a dark beast. Then a abby demon. Then another dark beast XD.
  3. Then a higher level player gets randomly teled to you and you fight him or her.
  4. If you manage to live, you get pranked and sent to a chaos ele, but that doesnt count. =]]
  5. Adds the summoning cape to your inventory aka champion cape in my server.

Does a cool emote. Really hard to get. Best part is… You don’t lose items XD.

I don’t even know if this is possible tbh. I just thought of the idea lol.

=]][/quote]

yeah that is very much so possible, just keep working at it and you will get it soon

Read full topic

=]]

item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

Well its not nearly as good as Delta’s castlewars, but its a minigame that I made today and i think it is pretty good, just wanted to see what you guys think about it.

Here’s the basics of the game:

  1. Players split up into two teams, sara vs zammy (hence godwars).
  2. The game is kinda like a team based version of fight pits, the two teams face off until one team is left standing.
  3. During the game, you get a “killcount” which defines how many points you will receive if your team wins, so therefore you have to actually do something to help your team win, or you won’t get as many points.
  4. After the game is completed, the losing team goes home and the winning team rejoices with some newfound points, which they can spend on various god-based rewards (god armor, god robes, godswords etc.).

Here are some pictures of the game, which may or may not be in chronological order:

Me at the waiting room:

You can’t enter the game with capes or hoods/hats on!

Joining the zammy team, notice it gives you a cape and hood, similar to castlewars:

You will be unable to remove your cape and hood, nor be able to equip any other capes or hoods/hats during the game:

After the 5 min are up, the game begins! Good luck.

Anyway, i just wanted to see what the rest of the community thinks about this minigame, and maybe some features i can add. Also if ur just gonna post something like “omg n33b l2code coz ur minigame sux0r” then just try to refrain… thanks
